sentences.en: On the one hand, the rhythms between musical symbol and orchestic symbol are infiltrated each other.
sentences.cn: 一方面，音乐符号的律动与舞蹈符号的律动之间具有某种互渗；

sentences.en: Powerful actual imitate system will make the player is in those who experience glamour of music, orchestic , experience more the life of rich and colorful.
sentences.cn: 强大的现实模拟系统将使玩家在感受音乐、舞蹈的魅力之余，体验更丰富多彩的生活。

sentences.en: There are some relations between musical and orchestic symbols .
sentences.cn: 音乐符号和舞蹈符号存在着某种互渗互阐。
